On FY FY Tag Valid {{ record.updatedDt }} {{ record.fy }} {{ record.fyTag }} {{ record.validInd }} No records found. import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { NSmanPersonalInfo } from 'app/enquiry/nsman/model/nsman.model'; @Component({ selector: 'n2-nsman-increment-tag', templateUrl: './nsman-increment-tag.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nsman-increment-tag.component.scss'] }) export class NsmanIncrementTagComponent implements OnInit { @Input() nsmanInfo: NSmanPersonalInfo; placeholder: any[] = []; fyOptions = ['ALL', '2022', '2021', '2020']; viewValidOrAll = "all"; selectedFY: string; constructor() { // } ngOnInit(): void { // } exportCSV(): void { // } showFY(): void { // } showAllRecords(): void { // } showValidRecords(): void { // } }
